Text:
You won't find a more dedicated NIN fan than myself... but from what I've heard from the leaks so far...  I am NOT impressed.... Looks like the 'Downward Spiral' continues for Trent...

Thanks for the post, though :)

I really liked The Hand That Feeds. It was catchy.
Gonna check this out now.


Oh, and thanks for the upload, appreciate it.
The song won't play in WMP or Media player classic. Is the file just bogus or does anyone have a way to make it play?
